++ Change Sensitivity

CS is how responsive to change. Detecting changes involves:
    * [Watch]ing
    * [Hooking]
    * PointConsistency

Change Sensitivity is important because it promotes [LiveData].
    * Change should not be ignored - AlwaysFeedback changes with ProgressiveFeedback
    * ReversibilitySystem and UndoWillUndo

CS needs to be ContinuousInitialization for [Performance].
